arabicText: قَالَ فَٱهْبِطْ مِنْهَا فَمَا يَكُونُ لَكَ أَن تَتَكَبَّرَ فِيهَا فَٱخْرُجْ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰغِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Said	Allah,	“Therefore	go	down	from	here	-
it	 does	 not	 befit	 you	 to	 stay	 here	 and	be	
proud	- exit,	you	are	of	the	degraded.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāya	 tu	 yahāñ	 se	 utar	 jā	 tujhe	 nahiñ	
pahuñchta	ke	yahāñ	rah	kar	ghuroor	kare	
nikal	tu	hai	zillat	wāloñ	meiñ

arabicText: قَالَ أَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“Give	me	respite	till	the	day	when	
people	will	be	resurrected.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bola	 mujhe	 fursat	 de	 us	 din	 tak	 ke	 log	
uthāaye	jāyeñ

arabicText: قَالَ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
englishTranslationText: Said	Allah,	“You	are	given	respite.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Farmāya: Tujhe	mohlat	hai.

arabicText: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأَقْعُدَنَّ لَهُمْ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “Hence	 I	 swear	 by	 the	 fact	 that	
You	sent	me	astray,	 I	will	certainly	lay	in	
wait	for	them	on	Your	Straight	Path.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bola	to	qasam	iski	ke	toone	mujhe	gumrāh	
kiya	 maiñ	 zaroor	 tere	 seedhe	 rāste	 par	
unki	tāk	meiñ	baithooñga

arabicText: ثُمَّ لَـَٔاتِيَنَّهُم مِّنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ وَعَنْ أَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ وَعَن شَمَآئِلِهِمْ ۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ أَكْثَرَهُمْ شَـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Then	 I	 will	 certainly	 approach	 them	 -
from	their	front	and	from	behind	them	and	
from	 their	 right	 and	 from	 their	 left;	 and	
You	will	find	most	of	them	not	thankful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 zaroor	 maiñ	 unke	 pās	 āuñga	 unke	
āage	aur	peeche	aur	dāhine	aur	bāayeiñ	se	
aur	 tu	 un	 meiñ	 aksar	 ko	 shukr	 guzār	 na	
pāayega

arabicText: قَالَ ٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا مَذْءُومًۭا مَّدْحُورًۭا ۖ لَّمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāya: Yahāñ	se	nikal	ja	radd	kiya	gayā	
rāñda	(Dhutkāra)	huwa	zaroor	jo	un	meiñ	
se	 tere	 kahe	 par	 chalā	 Maiñ	 tum	 sab	 se	
jahannam	bhar	duñga

arabicText: وَيَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسْكُنْ أَنتَ وَزَوْجُكَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ فَكُلَا مِنْ حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَا وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 said,	 “O	 Adam!	 You	 and	 your	 wife	
dwell	 in	 Paradise	 - therefore	 eat	 from	 it	
from	 wherever	 you	 wish,	 and	 do	 not	
approach	this	tree	for	you	will	become	of	
those	who	transgress.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aye	Ādam tu	aur	tera	joda	Jannat	meiñ	
raho	to us	meiñ	se	jahāñ	chāho	khāo	aur	us	
perd	 ke	 pās	 na	 jāna	 ke	 had	 se	 badhne	
wāloñ	meiñ	hoge

arabicText: فَوَسْوَسَ لَهُمَا ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ لِيُبْدِىَ لَهُمَا مَا وُۥرِىَ عَنْهُمَا مِن سَوْءَٰتِهِمَا وَقَالَ مَا نَهَىٰكُمَا رَبُّكُمَا عَنْ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَا مَلَكَيْنِ أَوْ تَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰلِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Then	Satan	created	apprehensions	in	their	
hearts	in	order	to	disclose	to	them	matters	
of	 their	 shame	 which	 were	 hidden	 from	
them,	 and	 said,	 “Your	 Lord	 has	 forbidden	 you	 from	 this	 tree,	 for	 you	 may	 become	 angels	 or	
immortals.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	shaitān	ne	Unke	jee	(Dil)	meiñ	khatra	
dāla	 ke	 un	 par	 khol	 de	 unki	 sharam	 ki	
cheezeiñ	 jo	 unse	 chhupi	 theiñ	 aur	 bola	
tumheiñ	tumhāre	Rab ne	is	ped	se	isi	liye	man’a	farmāya	hai	ke	kaheeñ	tum	do	farishte	ho	jāo	ya	
hamesha	jeene	wāle

arabicText: وَقَاسَمَهُمَآ إِنِّى لَكُمَا لَمِنَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	he	swore	to	them,	“Indeed	I	am	a	well-wisher	for	both	of	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	unse	qasam	khāyi	ke	maiñ	tum	donoñ	ka	khair	khwāh	hooñ.

arabicText: فَدَلَّىٰهُمَا بِغُرُورٍۢ ۚ فَلَمَّا ذَاقَا ٱلشَّجَرَةَ بَدَتْ لَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخْصِفَانِ عَلَيْهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ وَنَادَىٰهُمَا رَبُّهُمَآ أَلَمْ أَنْهَكُمَا عَن تِلْكُمَا ٱلشَّجَرَةِ وَأَقُل لَّكُمَآ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ لَكُمَا عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
So	 he	 brought	 them	 down	with	 deception;	 and	when	 they	 tasted	 from	 that	 tree,	 their	 shame	
became	manifest	 to	 them	and	 they	began	attaching	 the	leaves	of	Paradise	on	 themselves;	and	
their	Lord	said	to	them,	“Did	I	not	forbid	you	from	that	tree,	and	tell	you	that	Satan	is	an	open	
enemy	to	you?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	utār	lāya	unheiñ	fareb	se	phir	jab	unhoñ	ne	woh	ped	chakha	unpar	unki	sharam	ki	cheezeiñ	
khul	gayiñ	aur	apne	badan	par	Jannat	ke	patte	chiptāne	lage	aur	unheiñ		un	ke	Rab	ne	farmāya	
kya	maiñ	 ne	 tumheiñ	 us	 ped	 se	man’a	 na	 kiya	 aur	 na	 farmāya	 tha	 ke	 shaitān	 tumhāra	 khula	
dushman	hai

arabicText: قَالَا رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَآ أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	both	submitted,	“Our	Lord!	We	have	
wronged	 ourselves;	 so if	 You	 do	 not	
forgive	 us	 and	 have	 mercy	 on	 us,	 then	
surely,	we	are	of	the	losers.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Donoñ	ne	‘arz	ki	aey	Rab" Hamāre	ham	ne	
apna	āap	 burā	 kiya	 to	agar	 tu	 hameiñ	 na	
bakhshe	 aur	 ham	 par	 rahem	 na	 kare	 to	
ham	zaroor	nuqsān	wāloñ	meiñ	huye

arabicText: قَالَ ٱهْبِطُوا۟ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّۭ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّۭ وَمَتَـٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“Go	down,	one	of	you	is	a	foe	unto	
the	 other;	 and	 for	 a	 fixed	 time	 you	 shall	
stay	on	earth	and	feed	in	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāya	 utro	 tum	 meiñ	 ek	 doosre	 ka	
dushman	hai	aur	tumheiñ	zameen	meiñ	ek	
waqt	tak	thaharna	aur	baratna	hai

arabicText: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحْيَوْنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنْهَا تُخْرَجُونَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “You	 shall	 live	 there	 and	 there	
shall	you	die,	and	from	there	only	you	will	
be	raised.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāya	 usi	 meiñ	 jiyoge	 aur	 usi	 meiñ	
maroge	aur	usi	meiñ	se	uthāaye	jāoge

arabicText: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ قَدْ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكُمْ لِبَاسًۭا يُوَٰرِى سَوْءَٰتِكُمْ وَرِيشًۭا ۖ وَلِبَاسُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Descendants	 of	 Adam!	 We	 have	 sent	
down	 to	 you	 a	 garment	 to	 conceal	 your	
shame,	 and	 another	 garment	 for	 your	
elegance;	and	the	garment	of	piety	- that	is	
the	best;	this	is	among	the	signs	of	Allah,	so	
that	they may	remember.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Ādam ki	 aulād" Be-shak	 ham	 ne	
tumhāri	 taraf	 ek	 libās	 woh	 utāra	 ke	
tumhāri	 shram	 ki	 cheezeiñ	 chhupāye	aur	
ek	woh	ke	tumhāri	ārāish	aur	parhez-gāri	
ka	 libās	 woh	 sab	 se	 bhlā	 yeh	 Allah	 ki	
nishāniyoñ	 meiñ	 se	 hai	 ke	 kahiñ	 woh	
nasihat	māneiñ

arabicText: يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ لَا يَفْتِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ كَمَآ أَخْرَجَ أَبَوَيْكُم مِّنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ يَنزِعُ عَنْهُمَا لِبَاسَهُمَا لِيُرِيَهُمَا سَوْءَٰتِهِمَآ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ يَرَىٰكُمْ هُوَ وَقَبِيلُهُۥ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا تَرَوْنَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	Descendants	of	Adam,	beware!	Do	not	let	
Satan	put	you	in	trial	the	way	he	removed	
your	parents	from	Paradise	and	had	their	
garments	 removed	 so	 that	 their	 shame	
become	visible	to	them;	indeed	he	and	his	
tribe	 see	 you	 from	where	 you	do	not	 see	
them;	indeed	We	have	made	the	devils	the	
friends	of	those	who	do	not	believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Ādam ki	 aulād" Khabar-dār	 tumheiñ		
shaitān	 fitne	 meiñ	 na	 dāle	 jaisa	 tumhāre	
māñ	bāp	ko	bihisht	se	nikāla	utarwa	diye	
unke	 libās	 ke	 unki	 sharm	 ki	 cheezeiñ	
unheiñ nazar	padiñ	be-shak	woh	aur	uska	
kumba	tumheiñ		wahān	se	dekhte	haiñ	ke	
tum	 unheiñ	 nahi	 dekhte	 be-shak	 hum	 ne	
shaitānoñ	 ko	 unka	 dost	 kiya	 hai	 jo	 Imān	
nahi	lāte.

arabicText: وَإِذَا فَعَلُوا۟ فَـٰحِشَةًۭ قَالُوا۟ وَجَدْنَا عَلَيْهَآ ءَابَآءَنَا وَٱللَّهُ أَمَرَنَا بِهَا ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَأْمُرُ بِٱلْفَحْشَآءِ ۖ أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	 they	 commit	any	 shameful	act	
they	say,	 “We	 found	our	 forefathers	on	it	
and	 Allah has	 commanded	 it	 to	 us”;	 say,	
“Indeed	Allah does	not	ordain	shamelessness;	what!	You	attribute	things	to	Allah,	which	you	do	
not	know?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	koi	be-hayāyi	kareiñ	to	kehte	haiñ	
hum	ne	is	par	apne	bāp	dāda	ko	pāya	aur	
Allah	ne	hameiñ	iska	ḥukm		diya	to	farmao	be-shak	Allah	be-hayāyi	ka	ḥukm		nahi	deta	kya	Allah	
par	woh	bāt	lagāte	ho	jiski	tumheiñ	khabar	nahi

arabicText: قُلْ أَمَرَ رَبِّى بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ وُجُوهَكُمْ عِندَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍۢ وَٱدْعُوهُ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ ۚ كَمَا بَدَأَكُمْ تَعُودُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“My	Lord	has	ordained	justice;	and	set	your	attention	straight	every	time	you	offer	pray	and	
worship	Him,	as	only	His	devoted	worshippers;	the	way	He	brought	you	into	being,	in	the	same	
manner	will you	return.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmao	mere	Rab	ne	insāf	ka	ḥukm	diya	hai	aur	apne	muñh	seedhe	karo	har	Namāz	ke	waqt	
aur	Uski	Ibādat	karo	nire	 (Khālis) uske	bande	hokar	jaise	usne	 tumhāra	āāghāz	kiya waise	hi	
palto	ge

arabicText: فَرِيقًا هَدَىٰ وَفَرِيقًا حَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةُ ۗ إِنَّهُمُ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
He	has	guided	one	group,	and	one	group’s	error	has	been	proved;	instead	of	Allah,	 they	have	
chosen	the	devil	as	their	friend	and	they	assume	that	they	are	on	guidance!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ek	firqe	ko	rāh	dikhayi	aur	ek	firqe	ki	gumrahi	sābit	huwi	unhoñ	ne	Allah	ko	chhord	kar	shaitānoñ	
ko	wāli	banaya	aur	samajhte	yeh	haiñ	ke	woh	rāh	par	haiñ

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ خُذُوا۟ زِينَتَكُمْ عِندَ كُلِّ مَسْجِدٍۢ وَكُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ وَلَا تُسْرِفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Descendants	 of	 Adam!	 Adorn	 yourself	
when	 you	 go	 to	 the	 masjid,	 and	 eat	 and	
drink,	and	do	not	 cross	limits;	indeed	He	
does	not	like	the	transgressors.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey Ādam ki	 aulād" Apni	 zeenat	 lo	 jab	
Masjid	meiñ	jāo	aur	khāo	aur	piyo	aur	had	
se	na	badho	be-shak	had	se	badhne	wāle	
usey	pasand	nahi.

arabicText: قُلْ مَنْ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَخْرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ مِنَ ٱلرِّزْقِ ۚ قُلْ هِىَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا خَالِصَةًۭ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ كَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“Who	has	forbidden	the	adornment	of	
Allah which	He	 has	 brought	 forth	 for	His	
bondmen,	and	 the	good food?”	Say,	“That	
is	for	the	believers	in	this	world,	and	on	the	
Day	 of	 Resurrection	 it	 will	 be	 for	 them	
only”;	this	is	how	We	explain	Our	verses	in	
detail	for	people	of	knowledge.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmao	kis	ne	harām	ki	Allah	ki	woh	
zeenat	jo	usne	apne	bandoñ	ke	liye	nikāli	
aur	 pāk	 rizq	 tum	 farmao	 ke	 woh	 Imān	
wāloñ	ke	liye	hai	duniya	meiñ	aur	qiyamat	
meiñ	 to	 khās	 unhiñ	 ki	 hai	 hum	 yooñhi	
mufassal	 āayateiñ	 bayān	 karte	 haiñ	 Ilm	
wāloñ		ke	liye.
